For the purpose of these General Terms: For the  purpose of these General Terms and Conditions this article defines the meaning  of the following terms and expressions:
Swapsee: the company incorporated under: Swapsee: the company incorporated under the laws of  Spain, Planet Swapsee, S.L
General Conditions: these general terms: General Conditions: these general terms and conditions
Website: the website located at the doma: Website: the website located at the domain … and/or  any other website owned or administered by Planet Swapsee, S.L. and located at  a Spanish domain, including the tools provided on that website
User: a person registered as a member of: User: a person registered as a member of the Website
Poster: a User that posts an advertiseme: Poster: a User that posts an advertisement for a Job or  a Skill to all or some Users or to one specific User
Job: any service, regardless its juridic: Job: any service, regardless its juridical nature, requested  by a Poster and/or subject of a User Contract
Skill: any skill or service, regardless: Skill: any skill or service, regardless its juridical  nature, offered by a Poster and/or subject of a User Contract
User Contract: A contract entered into b: User Contract: A contract entered into by Users regarding  one or various Jobs
Swap: the payment of a Job by delivering: Swap: the payment of a Job by delivering another Job  in return
Swapsee is domiciled at C/Josep Irla 13: Swapsee is  domiciled at C/Josep Irla 13 (08870) Sitges, Barcelona, Spain. Swapsee is  registered at the trade register of Barcelona, Book 43299, Binder 102, Section  8, Page 423723, first inscription, and is holder of Tax Identification Number (C.I.F.)  B65848525.
The General Conditions apply whenever a: The  General Conditions apply whenever a User makes use of the Website and they apply  to the complete legal relationship between Swapsee and Users, including all  services delivered by Swapsee to a User and their payment by the User to  Swapsee.
Users have accepted these General Terms: Users have  accepted these General Terms and Condition upon clicking the submit button  during the registration process.
If any clause of the General Conditions: If any  clause of the General Conditions is declared null and void or invalid by court  sentence, this shall not affect the validity and enforceability of those  clauses not affected by said declaration of nullity or invalidity.
The User is not allowed to violate any: The User is not  allowed to violate any laws, third party rights or the General Conditions,  whether by posting Jobs, making offers, enter into User Contracts or in any  other way using the Website. The User is obliged to fulfill any tax obligation  and any other obligation towards government authorities arising from the use of  this website and the entering into User Agreements.
The User is not allowed to use the Webs: The User is not  allowed to use the Website when he or she is not able to form legally binding  contracts.
The User is not allowed to circumvent o: The User is not  allowed to circumvent or manipulate the fee structure or the billing process of  Swapsee. The User is not allowed to transfer his Swapsee account to another  party.
The User is not allowed to post false,: The User is not  allowed to post false, inaccurate, misleading, defamatory, or libelous content;
The User is not allowed to distribute v: The User is not  allowed to distribute viruses or any other technologies that may harm Swapsee,  the Website , or the interests or property of other Users; to harvest or  otherwise collect information about Users, including email addresses, without  their consent or to distribute or post spam, unsolicited or bulk electronic  communications apart from the Posting of offers by way of filling out the  appropriate forms.
The User is not allowed to copy, modify: The User is not  allowed to copy, modify, or distribute rights or content from the Website.
User Contracts are entered into by User: User Contracts are  entered into by Users and have as subject the rendering of a certain Job in  exchange for money or a Job in return (Swap).
In case a price in money is agreed, the: In case a price  in money is agreed, the User Contract is materialized by:
the posting of a Job by a User to all o: the posting of a  Job by a User to all or some Users or to one specific User,
a consequent offer in money regarding t: a consequent  offer in money regarding that Job by another User and
the consequent acceptance of this offer: the consequent acceptance  of this offer by the Poster.
In case a Swap is agreed, the User Cont: In case a Swap  is agreed, the User Contract is materialized by:
a consequent offer regarding that Job a: a consequent  offer regarding that Job and the proposal of a Job in return by another User,
the acceptance of the proposed Job or S: the acceptance  of the proposed Job or Skill in return by the original poster
As long as an offer has not been accept: As long as an  offer has not been accepted, a User is allowed to modify its original post.  Modifying a post renders earlier offers regarding that post invalid.
Once the Job(s) subject of the User Con: Once the Job(s)  subject of the User Contract is/are performed, the Performer(s) send a message  of completion to the other Party. If a price in money is agreed upon payment  takes place within 10 days after the message of completion has been sent.
Upon completion, Parties will post an a: Upon completion,  Parties will post an accurate review of the Job on the website.
Users pay Swapsee for using the website: Users pay Swapsee for using the website at a certain moment during the posting and allocation process. Prices may vary and details are available on the website. These prices and details can be changed with a month's notice.
Users also pay Swapsee to place their jo: Users also pay Swapsee to place their jobs and skills in a special promotional section of the website. Prices may vary and details are available on the website. These prices and details can be changed with a month's notice.
Swapsee might offer Users different acco: Swapsee might offer Users different account types. Prices may vary and details are available on the website. These prices and details can be changed with a month's notice.
In case a conflict arises between Users: In case a  conflict arises between Users, both Users can report the issue to Swapsee. Upon  request by both or either User, Swapsee will mediate between Users and offer  the solution to the conflict it deems appropriate. Neither the mediation nor  the proposed solution is in any way binding to parties and does not prevent Users  from taking any other legal action they deem fit.
